channel.title: Heres An Idea
channel.description:
The Death Penalty~
In America Alone Thousands Of Americans Die each From the Death Penaltay. Now instead of Killing them then burying them how about this.
As you know many People have heart problems and need a transplant,Same with blood,liver,etc.Why Doesent The goverment Just Use The people on deathrow as donor to help save lives too.The Inmate's Get what they deserve AND they can die knowing even though that killed/hurt someone they saved someones life.So why dont we do that?

item.title: Heres An Idea
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

lol, everyone in death row is there because of a rough life, drugs abuse n shit aswell as multiple murders n crap…

didnt you see the simpsons where homor got the wig from snake n homor turned evil??

Read full topic

item.title: Heres An Idea
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

3.65 kilos:

Wouldn’t the chemicals used in lethal injection make the organs risky to use in transplants?

Good point. Bring back the noose!

Read full topic

item.title: Heres An Idea
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=".Flair, post:3, topic:120076"]It’s a good idea

But I have a firm believing that the Death Penalty is fucked up. Many die innocent because of horrible luck that seems to be evidence. Others that did kill or rape get off, very messed up.[/quote]
i totally agree, i cant bare to think how many people have been killed innocently in the death penalty. (I agree because i was drug tested with a false result) so i know how easy it is with scientific results to have a small error.

Read full topic
